Sentencas: Samarium-doped ceria (SDC) can be used as electrolyte of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Influence of annealing temperature on the grain growth of samarium-doped ceria

Sentencas: In this study, SDC films have been deposited by E-beam evaporation at room temperature (RT) and 200 degrees C, and then annealed at 500, 600, 700, and 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Influence of annealing temperature on the grain growth of samarium-doped ceria

Sentencas: The structure and morphology of samples were analyzed by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and scanning electronic microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Influence of annealing temperature on the grain growth of samarium-doped ceria

Sentencas: Initial temperature for deposition of SDC films at RT and 200 degrees C, respectively, is shown to be critical with respect to crystallinity, texture coefficient, grain size, smoothness and morphology.
Titulo: Influence of annealing temperature on the grain growth of samarium-doped ceria

Sentencas: The SDC film as deposited at RT is amorphous and extremely smooth.
Titulo: Influence of annealing temperature on the grain growth of samarium-doped ceria

Sentencas: Whereas, the SDC film as deposited at 200 degrees C is crystalline, has a faceted surface, average grain size of 14 nm, arrow-head morphology, and no porosity.
Titulo: Influence of annealing temperature on the grain growth of samarium-doped ceria

Sentencas: Generally, after annealing from 500 to 800 degrees C for both types of films, the grain size is shown to increase with increasing temperature and the development of pores is noted.
Titulo: Influence of annealing temperature on the grain growth of samarium-doped ceria
